Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Karththarudaiya Oozhiyakkaarare, Thudhiyungal; Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Thudhiyungal.
3 sooriyan Udhikkum Thisaithodangi, Asthamikkum Thisaimattum Karththarudaiya Naamam Thudhikkappaduvadhaaga.
4 karththar Ellaa Jaadhigalmelum Uyarndhavar; Avarudaiya Magimai Vaanangalukku Melaanadhu.
5 unnadhangalil Vaasampannugira Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Samaanamaanavar Yaar?
6 avar Vaanaththilum Boomiyilumullavaigalaip Paarkkumpadi Thammai Thaazhththugiraar.
7 avar Siriyavanai Puzhudhiyilirundhu Thookkividugiraar; Eliyavanai Kuppaiyilirundhu Uyarththugiraar.
8 avanai Pirabukkalodum, Thamadhu Janaththin Adhibadhigalodum Utkaarappannugiraar.
9 maladiyai Sandhoshamaana Pillaiththaaichchiyaakki, Veettile Kudiyirukkappannugiraar. Allelooyaa.
